/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is lined with a variety of buildings, their architecture hinting at the rich history and culture of the city. Trees dot the landscape, adding a touch of green to the urban setting. Cars and bicycles traverse the road, indicating the city's active lifestyle. The sky above is a clear blue, suggesting a sunny day, and the sun casts a bright light over the scene, illuminating every detail.
